mapper.select: SELECT message.MESSAGE_ID, message.FROM_ID, `user`.REAL_NAME, message.TITLE, message.DETAIL, message.TYPE, message.CREAT_TIME FROM message JOIN `user` ON message.FROM_ID = `user`.USER_ID WHERE message.TO_ID = #{userId} ORDER BY message.CREAT_TIME DESC

SELECT student.USER_ID FROM student WHERE student.STU_ID IN ( SELECT stu_group.STU_ID FROM stu_group WHERE stu_group.GROUP_ID IN ( SELECT plea.STU_GROUP_ID FROM plea WHERE plea.STAGE = #{stage} ) AND stu_group.STAGE = #{stage} )

SELECT teacher.USER_ID FROM teacher WHERE teacher.TEACHER_ID IN ( SELECT acceptance_teacher.TEACHER_ID FROM acceptance_teacher WHERE acceptance_teacher.TEAM_ID IN ( SELECT plea.ACCEPTANCE_TEAM_ID FROM plea WHERE plea.STAGE = #{stage} ))

SELECT secretary.USER_ID FROM secretary WHERE secretary.SEC_ID IN ( SELECT acceptance_team.SEC_ID FROM acceptance_team WHERE acceptance_team.TEAM_ID IN ( SELECT plea.ACCEPTANCE_TEAM_ID FROM plea WHERE plea.STAGE = #{stage} ) )
SELECT USER_ID FROM student WHERE STU_ID = #{id}
SELECT COUNT(thesis_teacher.IS_RELEASE) FROM thesis_teacher WHERE thesis_teacher.IS_RELEASE = '1'
SELECT teacher.USER_ID FROM teacher WHERE teacher.TEACHER_ID IN ( SELECT DISTINCT thesis_teacher.TEACHER_ID FROM thesis_teacher WHERE thesis_teacher.IS_RELEASE = '1')
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM thesis_teacher WHERE thesis_teacher.THESIS_ID = ( SELECT thesis_teacher.THESIS_ID FROM thesis_teacher WHERE thesis_teacher.ID = #{id} ) AND thesis_teacher.SCORE = '-1'
mapper.update: UPDATE thesis SET thesis.`STATUS` = 'YCF', thesis.SCORE =( SELECT AVG( thesis_teacher.SCORE ) FROM thesis_teacher WHERE thesis_teacher.THESIS_ID = #{thesisId} ) WHERE thesis.THESIS_ID = #{thesisId}
mapper.select: SELECT thesis.THESIS_ID, student.USER_ID FROM thesis_teacher, thesis, student WHERE thesis_teacher.ID = #{id} AND thesis_teacher.THESIS_ID = thesis.THESIS_ID AND thesis.STU_ID = student.STU_ID
SELECT teacher.USER_ID FROM teacher, `subject` WHERE `subject`.SUB_ID = #{subId} AND `subject`.POSE_BY = teacher.TEACHER_ID
SELECT report.STAGE, student.USER_ID FROM report, student WHERE report.POSE_BY = student.STU_ID AND report.ID = #{id}

SELECT system_stage.STAGE_NAME, system_stage.DESCRIPTION FROM system_stage WHERE system_stage.STAGE_ID IN
#{item}
SELECT `user`.USER_ID FROM `user`, user_role WHERE `user`.USER_ID = user_role.USER_ID AND user_role.ROLE_ID != '1'
SELECT student.USER_ID FROM student, stage_task WHERE student.STU_ID = stage_task.STU_ID AND stage_task.TASK_ID = #{userId}
SELECT teacher.USER_ID FROM teacher, stage_task WHERE teacher.TEACHER_ID = stage_task.TEACHER_ID AND stage_task.TASK_ID = #{userId}
SELECT count(*) FROM plea WHERE plea.IS_RELEASE = '1' AND plea.STAGE = #{stage}
